title: The Anti-Social Behaviour of Horace Rumpole by John Mortimer - B
description:
THE ANTI-SOCIAL BEHAVIOUR OF HORACE RUMPOLE By John Mortimer.

Rumpole is back for a new two-part adventure, based on the 2007 novel.

First broadcast on BBC Radio 4 on 28th and 29th May 2008.

Part One - Rumpole on Trial
The magician of the Old Bailey is at his implacable best as he defends our ancient freedoms, while remaining uneasy about exactly what Hilda is up to in her continuing friendship with a high court judge.

Horace Rumpole ...... Timothy West
Hilda Rumpole ...... Prunella Scales
ÃƒÂ¢??Soapy SamÃƒÂ¢?? Ballard ...... Michael Cochrane
Bonny Bernard ...... Nicholas Le Prevost
Prosecutor Parkes ...... Roger May
Madam Chair of Magistrates ...... Jillie Mears
Graham Wetherby ...... David Holt
Lars Bergman ...... Matthew Morgan
Judge Bullingham ...... David Shaw-Parker
Fig Newton ...... Geoffrey Whitehead

Director Marilyn Imrie. 45 minutes.

Part Two - Going for Silk
Having avoided an ASBO, Rumpole is hoping to become a QC at last, as he prepares to defend a young man on a charge of murder.

Horace Rumpole ......Timothy West
Hilda Rumpole ...... Prunella Scales
Bonny Bernard ...... Nicholas Le Prevost
Anna Mckinnon ...... Jillie Mears
Police Doctor ...... Roger May
Prosecutor Noakes ...... Matthew Morgan
Judge Barnes ...... Geoffrey Whitehead
Graham Wetherby...... David Holt
Detective Inspector Belfrage ...... David Shaw-Parker

Director Marilyn Imrie. 45 minutes.

My recordings at 128kbps ABR joint-stereo LAME MP3.

Recorded from Freeview -> DVD Recorder -> MP3.
